title: Timezones
description:
Nobody likes to convert time!

Convert the given time from one city to another.
The clock could be giving the AM or PM time.
The requested time could be in 12h or 24h format.

Mod id: timezones

Manual: https://1drv.ms/b/s!Ag6Hl1GTATaRgqplCETWxmSvVeKJ3w

Thanks guys for all the suggestions!

The mod now supports logging and twitchplays.

The command for twitchplays is just "submit ####" where #### are the numbers of your conversion result.
